title: Cultural Taboos Quiz
description: How well do you know the do's and don'ts of different cultures around the world?

questions.question: In many Asian cultures, it is considered rude to do what with chopsticks?
options: Use them to point at food
Hold them in your left hand

questions.question: In Thailand, touching someone on which body part is considered very disrespectful?
In many Middle Eastern and South Asian cultures, using which hand to eat is considered offensive?
In Japan, tipping at a restaurant is generally considered what?
In India, showing the soles of your feet to someone is considered what?
In China, giving someone a clock as a gift is taboo because the phrase sounds like what?
In Brazil, making the 'OK' hand gesture (thumb and index finger in a circle) is considered what?
In Germany, it is considered bad luck to wish someone happy birthday when?
In South Korea, receiving a gift or business card with one hand is considered what?
In many Muslim countries, consuming which type of meat is strictly forbidden (haram)?
In Russia, shaking hands across a doorway threshold is considered what?
In Japan, blowing your nose loudly in public is considered what?
In Hindu culture, cows are considered sacred and it is taboo to do what?
In many European countries, placing your bread upside down on the table is considered what?
options: A sign you are finished eating

questions.question: In Chile, eating anything with your hands, even fries, is considered what?
